nodes.text: The Empress Teta system was a star system located in the Koros sector of the Deep Core, containing the planet Empress Teta and its moon, Atale. Carbonite mines within the system were conquered by a group known as the Krath thousands of years before the New Republic Era. According to the Qel-Droma Epics, the system had once been known as the Koros system, but the name was changed after the system's unification by the legendary Empress Teta.
